author: Highland
title: Piano Piano
text: Piano piano noto che
Non stavero bene insieme a te
Passa il tempo e vedo: si lo so
Non ti voglio pi, non esisti tu
I feel abused, I feel accused
I feel attacked
I feel smacked by no respect
Letting you go is easy
Lovin' you is hard
Damn, I should have known that
From the very start
You were smart, you stole my heart
And all that stuff
Messin' up, play my mind
Funny emotions all the time
I saw you vis-a-vis, who's she?
She's not me as I can see
Like I said lettin' go is easy
Lovin' you is hard
I don't wanna new start
Piano piano noto che
Non stavero bene insieme a te
Passa il tempo e vedo: si lo so
Non ti voglio pi, non esisti tu
You made me stick, you made me think
You made me sick, you dis me wrong
That's what I'm trying to tell you
With this song
So gimme love, touch me with it love
All eyes on me
I'm you queen, your lady
Your heart, can't you see?
So let me, tease me, please me
Or let me go out the door
'cos I can't stand
All the stress no more
That's for sure
Lady Scar is ready to score
(ha-ha) and I don't need you no more

Passa il tempo e vedo: si lo so

Non stavero bene...
...e vedo: si lo so
